content:
This chunk explains how to undo previous control of a model's joint by releasing the joint using `releaseJoint()` in Python or `release_joint()` in C++.

python

To undo a previous ~direct.actor.Actor.Actor.controlJoint() call, use the ~direct.actor.Actor.Actor.releaseJoint() method:

actor.releaseJoint("modelRoot", "Joint Name")

cpp

To undo a previous ~.PartBundle.control_joint() call, pass the name of the joint to the ~.PartBundle.release_joint() method:

bundle->release_joint("Joint Name");
